message: Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $1,400,000.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $1,200,000 is a strong offer, the value this product brings is truly unique. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,350,000.
I understand that the product has unique value, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $1,300,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
